com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.portals

Class TCPortalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.portals.TCPortalManager

  • public class TCPortalManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all plugins that provide portal teleportation logic for use by TrainCarts. Plugins can be registered with a PortalProvider which will be used to find the rails and directions to teleport the train at.

      • addPortalSupport

        public static void addPortalSupport(java.lang.String pluginName,
                                    java.lang.Class<? extends PortalProvider> providerClass)
        Registers a portal provider and the name of the plugin that provides it. When the plugin is detected, the provider is automatically initialized.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - of the plugin providing portal support
        providerClass - for handling portal logic

      • isAvailable

        public static boolean isAvailable(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Checks whether a particular portal teleportation providing plugin is enabled
        Parameters:
        pluginName - to check
        Returns:
        True if available

                                                     java.lang.String portalName)
        Gets the portal destination information for a particular portal name
        Parameters:
